coreAttributes.name: Otherworldly Draught
coreAttributes.description: A glass jar, filled with sloshing purple fluid. The label shows a bimbofied greater sergal girl chugging the bottle while a male pounds her from the back.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/20)]

A burst of refreshment soothes [npc.name] and bolsters [npc.her] strength.

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE, 1)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(remove)] the purple fluid from [npc.her] inventory, the draught sloshing about. Uncapping the bottle, [npc.she] [npc.verb(start)] drinking from it, the fluid disappearing into [npc.her] throat, leaving a warm feeling between [npc.her] legs. The taste dominates [npc.her] mouth, but [npc.she] [npc.do]n't mind one bit.
